snippet.title: Gimmick! 2 – Reveal Trailer – LRG3 2024
snippet.description:
Yumetaro is back! Embark on a sparkling journey in this long-awaited sequel to SUNSOFT’s legendary NES™ platformer Gimmick! Solve puzzles, trick enemies, and explore a physics-based playground.

Coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X and Steam in 2024.

Follow Bitwave Games on X for updates: http://www.x.com/bitwavegames

©2024 SUNSOFT © 2024 Developed by Bitwave Games.
© 2024 Published by Clear River Games. All rights reserved.
